page.title: 07The Mill at Sonning
page.content: The mill was a corn mill but now it is converted into a theatre . It is right on the River Thames and with willow trees drooping into it . I have been there. It was a very enjoyable experience .The play I saw was a modern comedy called{"My Fat {Friend".}I thought it was very good but the story was a bit weak .There were five actors and one actress . You have supper and drink and if you wish you can take your drink into the theatre. In the interval you can go to the restaurant and have your sweet and coffee.{The ticket costs Â£12.50}and includes the play and the dinner. My father knows the carpenter who does the scenery. He is very busy because there is a different play on every week. If you go into the bar there is a big water wheel working.
